Text.Page:
Now this place is suitable to defend ourselves.

But the Azura Tribe to the south still bothers me. I'm worried that they might assemble an attack on us. , can you help?"How can I help?"

It's simple. They won't dare stand a fight against us without their leaders.

Please go defeat Crystal Storage Executioners and Crystal Storage Foremen.

Thank you again, . Those nagas won't dare start a fight with us now.

We'll stay here and wait for the federation's reinforcements.

You go and stop Exodor.
